reviewText: There is nothing like this in the US so it's an original, fun DVD that kids and kids-at-heart will enjoy.

This DVD isn't able to be played on a regular DVD player...I can only play in on my laptop (my guess is because it originally comes from England). I'm glad I purchased the product because I wanted to have the DVD of the dancing diggers and couldn't find it anywhere else, but it is a little annoying that it can't be viewed on the TV and has to only be viewed on the laptop.
